user_query: I'm planning a trip to France and would like to know the details of the cities in the country. Please provide me with the cities in France with a population between 100,000 and 1,000,000. Also, give me the country details of France.

TaskList.description: Retrieve details of France as a country, including geographical and cultural information.
Query for cities in France with a population between 100,000 and 1,000,000.
